name: walmart_bulk_search
description: Search multiple products on Walmart in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling walmart_search multiple times - it is faster and more efficient. Pass all queries as a single comma-separated string.

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const items = document.querySelectorAll('[data-item-id], [class*="product-card"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(items.length, 5); i++) { const el = items[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('[data-automation-id="product-title"], [class*="product-title"], [class*="title"] a'); const priceEl = el.querySelector('[data-automation-id="product-price"], [class*="price-main"]'); const ratingEl = el.querySelector('[class*="rating"] [class*="stars"]'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/ip/"]'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img'); results.push({ title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 200) : '', price: priceEl ? priceEl.textContent.trim() : '', rating: ratingEl ? ratingEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '', image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '' }); } const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('q') || '', result_count: results.length, results: results }
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
